front.title: OAM for LPWAN using Static Context Header Compression (SCHC)

abstract.t: This document describes how SCHC can be used to efficiently perform basic Operation, Administration and Maintenance (OAM) on Low Power Wide Area Networks (LPWANs) by compressing ICMPv6/IPv6 headers, or by shielding the LPWAN network and the Device from undesirable ICMPv6 traffic. This document specifies additional behavior for SCHC [RFC8724] and extends the YANG Data Model defined in [RFC9363].
